content: butterfly bookmarker beaded and unbeaded versions materials thread size 10 thread in color of choice small amount hook size 4 boye or 2 mm hook misc size 11 seed beads 10 beads needed looped needle threader to string beads onto thread abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet dtr = treble_crochet cluster = cluster stitch p = picot close up of top skip = skip st = stitch lp = loop space = space decrease = together yo = wrap yarn over hook round = round cc = contrasting color mc = main color repeat = repeat close up of beaded top * repeat from as indicated = repeat between as indicated decrease = decrease draw up a loop in each of next 2 sts yo draw through all 3 loops on hook increase = increase work 2 stitches in the same stitch butterfly bookmarker small wing #1 chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook the 3rd chain from the hook will be your base st/ center of butterfly that you will slip_stitch into be sure to work over tail when sl stitching into the st chain 3 slip_stitch into top of the 1st chain 3 and the double_crochet chain 2 and slip_stitch into the base st large wing #
